Routine, Reason: patient with a kidney transplant. Annual/biannual assessment of renal allograft structure and perfusion. Assess for signs of evolving obstructive uropathy related to primary bladder issues or ureteral anastomotic stricture, Special Instructions: screen for development of kidney allograft cysts or mass lesions. Rule out renal artery stenosis and for patients with previous kidney biopsy, the evolution of arterio-venous fistulae, Order for future visit, Scheduling Location: BCH Children's - BCH Medical Imaging
